description: Loki v2+ showcase using JSON NGINX access logs.

panels.title: # NGINX log lines queried for this period

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({filename=~"$Services"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" and  __error__="" [$__interval])))

{filename=~"$Services"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" | line_format "{{.date}} {{.time}} ({{.status}}) in {{.geoip_country_name}} - {{.geoip_city_code}} {{.remote_addr}} {{.http_host}}{{.request_uri}}"

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename=~"$Services"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
max by (host) (max_over_time({filename=~"$Services", host="$host"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({filename=~"$Services"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
topk(300, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({filename=~"$Services"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({filename=~"$Services"} | json |  http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" and http_referer !~ ".*?\\*\\*\\*.*?" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

title: Nginx Proxy Manager
